00017   int gAttachedThreads = 0;

00019 
00020 BOOL WINAPI DllMain(HINSTANCE hInstance, DWORD dwReason, LPVOID)
00021 {
00022   BOOL result = TRUE;
00023   switch( dwReason ) 
00024   { 
00025   case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH:
00026     {
00027       std::string baseDir;
00028       baseDir.resize(1024);
00029       ::GetModuleFileName(hInstance, const_cast<char *>(baseDir.c_str()), baseDir.size());
00030       int pos = baseDir.find_last_of('/');
00031       if (pos == baseDir.npos)
00032         pos = baseDir.find_last_of('\\');
00033       baseDir = baseDir.substr(0, pos);
00034       baseDir.append("\\..\\");
00035       ::_putenv_s("SES_BASE_DIR", baseDir.c_str());
00036       gMain = WSESWrapperMain::instance();
00037       break;
00038     }
00039   case DLL_THREAD_ATTACH:
00040     {
00041       gAttachedThreads++;
00042       break;
00043     }
00044   case DLL_THREAD_DETACH:
00045     {
00046       gAttachedThreads--;
00047       break;
00048     }
00049 
00050   case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH:
00051     {
00052       if (gMain != 0)
00053         gMain->release();
00054       gMain = 0;
00055       break;
00056     }
00057   }
00058   return result;
00059 }

00188 int __stdcall WRP_SetPropertyBool(const char *property, int /* size */, const bool *value)
00189 {
00190   int error = WError::ERR_NOT_APPLICABLE;
00191   if (gMain->parameterType(property) == WSESWrapperMain::Property::TYPE_BOOL)
00192     error = gMain->setProperty(property, sizeof(bool), value);
00193   else
00194   {
00195           error = gMain->checkProperty(property, sizeof(bool));
00196           if (error == WError::ERR_OK)
00197                   error = gMain->setProperty(property, sizeof(bool), value);
00198   }
00199   return error;
00200 }
00201
